show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
On Todayâ€™s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy... <!--more--> (www.healthjournalistblog.
com and @alisonroselevy) speaks with Francesca Mason Bring, the author of Connecting to Our Ancestral Past.
A bi-cultural author, international facilitator and trainer, is an enrolled member of the Shoshone Nation and a graduate of Washington State University.
Francesca facilitates Family Constellation, Constellation as Ceremony and Human Systems Constellation, Francesca can be reached through her website, http://allmyrelationsconstellations.com/
